content: Consider a Wi-Fi router and networked devices around the home. Each device receives signals from the router, which transmits data from the internet.
translations: ita:Considera un router Wi-Fi e i dispositivi in rete in casa. Ogni dispositivo riceve segnali dal router, che trasmette dat
